content.raw:
Thanks @{557058:155a32e2-420c-4d50-98e0-0e722f63f906} , your solution solved my issue. So I am able to run the simulation. But encountered new error,

  

`developer@baila-PC:~/subt_ws$ ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`  
\[Dbg\] \[[Manager.cc:406](http://Manager.cc:406)\] Forked a process for \[ros\] command\[roslaunchsubt\_roscompetition\_init.launchworld\_name:=tunnel\_qual\_ignvehicle\_topics:=0\]

.

.
